data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Antique, Philippines.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Antique, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Antique, Philippines to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Antique, Philippines who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 230,900 souls in Antique and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Sama-Bajau people.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Antique, Philippines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 46 new simple churches in the state of Antique, Philippines. Place a simple church in every community of the 230,900 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Antique, Philippines to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
